00018 namespace BulletHell.Game
00019 {
00020     public class Opening : GameState
00021     {
00022         private Texture2D background;
00023         private GameState menu;
00024         private bool isStartPressed;
00025         private Vector2 startPos;
00026         private float startScale;
00027         private String startMsg = "Press Start";
00028 
00029         public Opening() { }
00030 
00031         protected override void Initialize()
00032         {
00033             menu = new Menu();
00034         }
00035 
00036         internal override void LoadContent()
00037         {
00038             background = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites\background");
00039             _GLOBAL.BGM = _GLOBAL.SoundBank.GetCue("OpeningBGM"); 
00040             _GLOBAL.BGM.Play();
00041         }
00042 
00043         protected override void UnloadContent() { }
00044 
00045         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00046         {
00047             NeedUpdate = true;
00048             NeedDraw = true;
00049 
00050             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();
00051 
00052             Vector2 startVect = _GLOBAL.HuakanFont.MeasureString(startMsg);
00053 
00054             /* Put the string in the center of x axis and at the bottom 200 of y axis */
00055             startPos = new Vector2(_GLOBAL.Viewport.Width / 2 - startVect.X / 2, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height - 200);
00056 
00057             /* Activate menu if enter is pressed */
00058             if (!isStartPressed)
00059             {
00060                 if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEnter())
00061                 {
00062                     _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.activate(menu);
00063                     _GLOBAL.SoundBank.PlayCue(_GLOBAL.onConfirm);
00064                     isStartPressed = true;
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 startScale = 1.0f + (float)Math.Cos(gameTime.TotalGameTime.TotalSeconds * 1.2) / 20;
00068             }
00069             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00070         }
00071 
00072         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00073         {
00074             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteBlendMode.AlphaBlend);
00075             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(background, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect, Color.White);
00076 
00077             if (!isStartPressed)
00078             {
00079                 /* Draws the string with growing and shrinking effect */
00080                 _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.HuakanFont, startMsg, startPos,
00081                     new Color(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.6f + (float)Math.Cos(gameTime.TotalGameTime.TotalSeconds * 1.2) / 3),
00082                     0.0f, Vector2.Zero, startScale, SpriteEffects.None, 0);
00083             }
00084             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
